pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbarizing (2013, arcade game)$(br2)Used to access Decade's $(l:decade/riders/neo_decade#gaim)Gaim$(/l) form$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:gaim/riders/gaim)Kamen Rider Gaim$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l) while having the $(l:decade/arsenal/neo_diendriver)Neo Diendriver$(/l) in your inventory
